listForList

public java.util.List<PaymentCustomField> listForList(Account account,
                                                      boolean loan)
Description copied from interface: PaymentCustomFieldService
Lists payment custom fields which are visible result column for the given account history. The second argument is a flag indicating whether the custom fields are to be shown under loan details or normal account history

Specified by:

Lists payment custom fields which are visible as search filters for the given account history. The second argument is a flag indicating whether the custom fields are to be shown under loan details or normal account history

saveValues

public void saveValues(Invoice invoice)
                throws SendingInvoiceWithMultipleTransferTypesWithCustomFields
Description copied from interface: PaymentCustomFieldServiceLocal
Saves the custom values for an invoice. This method also ensures that, in invoices from member to member (with only a destination account type), when multiple TTs are possible and at least one have custom fields, a SendingInvoiceWithMultipleTransferTypesWithCustomFields is thrown

Specified by:
saveValues in interface PaymentCustomFieldServiceLocal
Throws:
SendingInvoiceWithMultipleTransferTypesWithCustomFields - When there are more than one possible TTs and at least one have custom fields

list

protected java.util.List<PaymentCustomField> list(PaymentCustomField field)
Description copied from class: BaseCustomFieldServiceImpl
Should be implemented in order to list all fields like the given one. When fields are not dependent on other entities (like member / ads / admin / loan group) should return all. For others, like member record, should return all fields in the same member record as the given field

Specified by:
list in class BaseCustomFieldServiceImpl<PaymentCustomField>
